--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron finished pilling in another armfull of energon cubes. "That
> should be enough. Switchblade." he began. "Get into the control 
room, I
> want to know if this ship......can FLY." he finished, then reared 
his
> head back, and began to laugh out loud, his body shaking in his 
moment.


::Domnijoe and Blindchaos::

    Not quite sure what to do, the femme and triplechanger helped load 
energon cubes. When they were done, they both stood back and watched 
Megatron laugh. Nervously they chuckled with him.
    "I wish he would give us our orders" Blindchaos whispered 
nervously to Domnijoe.
    Domnijoe smiled at her comapion's comment.
    "Lord Megatron..I believe you had orders to give us?"

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
